oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chronicles of Race, Sex, and Schools
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; Lee, George W.; race; schools;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pages 24-30 of an unknown magazine. Contains several brief news stories from March and April, 1975. Handwritten note on first page reads: "The [illegible] failure of integrated schools is because to [sic] little effort has been made to make it work".
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Mary B. Clark
